SEARCH
Package org.bolu.scraper

Class Scraper

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.bolu.scraper.Scraper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Amazon, Box, EbuyerScraper, LaptopsDirect, StockMustGo
public class Scraper extends Thread
The base class for implementing specific website scrapers. Manages common methods and configurations for scraping laptops.

  • Nested Class Summary
